11.eng-name: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Ibn AbuNajih reported from his father on the authority of two men from Banu Bakr who said:We saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) addressing (the people) in the middle of the tashriq days when we were staying near his mount. This is the address of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) which he gave at Mina

chapter.eng-name: What Day Should A Sermon Be Delivered In Mina ?
